mapper.insert: # 主键冲突，报错 INSERT IGNORE INTO success_killed(seckill_id, user_phone) VALUES (#{seckillId}, #{userPhone});
mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, state, s.seckill_id "seckill.seckill_id", s.name "seckill.name", s.number "seckill.number", s.start_time "seckill.start_time", s.end_time "seckill.end_time", s.create_time "seckill.create_time" FROM success_killed sk, seckill s WHERE sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId} AND sk.user_phone = #{userPhone} AND sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id;
